1.12.2.1.6: added the flamethrower! Now you can kill spiders from a distance!
1.12.2.1.5: fixed some bugs with tools, added particle effects, config file
1.12.2.1.4: fixed rest of the lingering bugs with fire tools, and fixed some world gen issues
1.12.2.1.3: fixed some bugs with the fire and ender tools
1.12.2.1.2: Changed how the ender sword teleports hit mobs, made ender arrow teleports slightly more accurate
1.12.2.1.1: Added swords with multiple types, bug fixes
